description: The round payoff this round was 98. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 49.
Both players have demonstrated a history of cooperation by choosing option 1, which maximizes individual payoffs through an even split of the round payoff.

The game structure incentivizes mutual selection of option 1 over option 2, as it yields a higher payoff (e.g., 49 each from 98) compared to scenarios involving option 2, where payoffs are reduced or zero for one player.
Unilateral defection (choosing option 2 while the other chooses option 1) results in a lower payoff than mutual cooperation, potentially discouraging risky strategies in future rounds.
